en.layout.groupvalley_maintenance: GroupValley Maintenance / 维护中。。。。。。感谢您的耐心与理解！
en.layout.error_try_again_refresh: 请刷新页面后重新尝试！谢谢！
en.layout.title: 活动主题
en.layout.groupvalley_runs_on_your_support: GroupValley runs on your Support!  /  我们感谢您的支持！
en.layout.day_ago: {daysElapsed, number} {daysElapsed, plural,one { day ago} other { days ago}}
en.layout.failed_to_reconnect_try_again: Please check your connection, then try again. / 网络好像出问题了，请检查您的网络，稍后重新尝试！
en.layout.copy_and_paste_link_elsewhere: Copy and paste link elsewhere:  / 复制链接
en.home.chats_description: Talk with people about local topics or to just connect with people in your area.   / 参与附近感兴趣的话题，遇见新朋友！
en.home.activities_description: Join or plan activities so that you can do what you love while making new friends in your area.  / 参与附近感兴趣的活动或发起新活动，结识更多新朋友！
en.sign_in.agree_to_terms: By signing in, you agree to the {terms} and {privacy}, including Cookie use.   / 若您登陆GroupValley，即表示您认同我们的条款与政策，包括Cookie政策。如您有疑问，欢迎联系我们！
en.sign_in.terms: Terms of Service  / 服务条款
en.sign_in.privacy: Data Privacy Policy  / 隐私政策
en.layout_error.oops_problem: Oops! There was a problem...    / 糟糕！出现问题了 *。*
en.layout_error.make_sure_up_to_date: To access GroupValley.com, make sure your browser is up-to-date!  / 如果您无法登陆 GroupValley.com 请检查并确保您的浏览器已更新！
en.layout_error.reload_groupvalley: Reload GroupValley    / 重新载入 GroupValley   / 正在刷新 GroupValley
en.layout.first_view_message_1: GroupValley is an app for building friendships and exploring your city. Join a chat or activity with people in your area!  / GroupValley 是一款为大众服务，以用户所在城市为中心，通过发起活动或聊天话题来建立友谊和探索新事物的社交应用程序。 快来加入附近您感兴趣的活动或聊天吧！
en.layout.first_view_message_2: To make the most out of GroupValley, start off by signing in!   / 想要开始探索周围正在发生的事物吗？快快登陆认识更多新朋友吧！
en.layout.first_signin_message_1: From the menu in the upper left, you can create and discover activities and local chats, to make friends in your area!  / 点击左上角的小地球标志察看并选择加入附近的话题与活动，遇见新朋友！
en.signin.twitter_failed_header: Signing into Twitter has failed!   / 无法使用 Twitter 登陆
en.signin.google_failed_header: Signing into Google has failed!   / 无法使用 Google 帐号登陆
en.signin.facebook_failed_header: Signing into Facebook has failed!  / 无法使用 Facebook 登陆
en.report.please_describe_why_reporting: Please describe what you're reporting so we can take action accordingly  / 请描述您所要报告的内容，我们会在接到报告后尽快处理！感谢您的反馈和参与！
en.report.failed_to_send: Failed to send report    / 报告发送失败！
en.chat_home.no_recent_chats: No Recent Chats    / 这里什么都没有喔！
en.category_filter.select_one_category: Please select at least one category and one age filter.
en.category_filter.get_notified_with_filter: Get notified about new Activities with these filters?   / 要接受新筛选条件的活动推送吗？
en.category_info_popup.social_entertainment: Concerts 演唱会 | Dining 聚餐| Fun Activities 聚会 | Games 游戏 | Nightlife 夜生活| Social Hikes 探索自然 | Socialize 社交
en.category_info_popup.learning_skills_desc: Arts and Crafts 手工DIY | Book Clubs 书友会| Knitting 针织| Language 语言| Music 音乐| Photography 摄影| Tech 科技IT| Writing 写作
en.category_info_popup.health_fitness_suppo: Beliefs | Exercise 运动 | Meditation | Parenting 育儿经| Peer Support 团队提升 | Self-Improvement 个人提升 | Strength Training 力量训练| Yoga 瑜伽
en.discover.suggestion_notifications: Don't want to miss out on the fun?  不想错过有趣的活动？
en.discover.what_do_you_want_to_chat_about: What do you want to chat about?  您有想要发起的话题吗？
en.location_selector.search_for_city_nearby: Search for a city nearby...， 搜索附近的城市...
en.create_chat.valid_topic_popup: Please enter a valid chat topic， 无效话题， 话题太长或太短。
en.create_chat.valid_topic_popup_character_: (Must be between 10 and 40 characters) 话题需要10-40个字
en.create_chat.sign_in_to_create_chat: 您需要登录后才能发起新话题。
en.create_chat.select_location_popup: 请选择您发起话题的所在地
en.create_chat.inappropriate_popup2: Your group name looks a bit inappropriate. Please try a different name. 组织名称好像不太合适哦，请使用其它名称。
en.create_chat.spam_popup: Spammy Group Name， 警告：此名称有可能被系统识别为垃圾名称。
en.create_chat.spam_popup2: Your group name looks a bit like spam. Please try a different name. 使用此名称有可能被系统识别为垃圾名称， 请使用其它名称。
en.chat.post_invite_popup: Post an invite to jumpstart the conversation! 邀请加入话题讨论！
en.chat.message_send_error_try_again: Please reconnect, then try again. 请重新连接之后再试！
en.chat.failed_to_reconnect: Failed to reconnect! 📡 重新连接失败！📡
en.chat.adblock_popup_header: GroupValley uses advertising to make this service available to everyone.
en.chat.adblock_popup_please_disable: Please disable your ad blocker to join the conversation! 💬
en.chat.external_link_header: Are you sure you want to open this external link? 确定要打开这个外部链接吗？
en.chat.switching_servers: Switching servers. This could take a minute...
en.chat.rate_limited_try_again: Please wait a minute, then try again. 请稍等！ 一分钟后再试。
en.chat_component.expired_chat_button: 发现新话题并参与讨论
en.chat_component.not_authorized: 只有活动参与者才可以参与有关于此活动的讨论哦！申请参与
en.chat_component.must_be_signed_in_to_view: 你需要登录后才能浏览此话题的讨论。

en.listing.cancel_activity_confirmation_2: Canceling an activity is permanent. There will be no way to undo this action.

en.listing.attending_status_failed: 获取活动参与者列表失败

en.create_activity.start_time_must_be_futur: The start time of an activity must be in the future and not more than two months from now.

en.cookie_bar.content: We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on GroupValley.
en.notifications.select_get_notified_about: Select what you want to get notified about
en.notifications.notifications_blocked: Your browser has notifications blocked. See instructions for unblocking:
en.notifications.not_available: Sorry! Notifications do not appear to be available in your browser. Consider trying a different browser.
en.notifications.device_notification_prompt: Turn on device notifications so you won't miss out on what's happening.
en.notifications.email_notification_prompt: Turn on email notifications so you won't miss out on what's happening.
en.notifications.notifications_not_supporte: Push notifications are not currently supported for your browser.
en.notifications.has_accepted_your_request_: has accepted your request to join:
en.account.reset_hidden_message: This will reset all users that you have hidden from chats.
en.account.account_deleted: Your account has been successfully deleted.
en.account.leaving_message: This will permanently delete your GroupValley account. It is easy to come back if you ever change your mind!
en.profile.username_directions: At least 2 and no more than 15 alphanumeric characters (upper/lowercase letters A-Z, numbers 0-9) or underscores
en.profile.invalid_about_me: Invalid text for the About Me section
en.privacy.not_applied_retroactively: Changes will not be applied retroactively
en.contribute.thank_you: Thank you for contributing to GroupValley!
en.contribute.thank_you_message: Without you, we would not be able to fund and grow this community. Contributions will go towards continually improving GroupValley and keeping it running. Contributions like yours will help us to make our community thrive.
en.contribute.thank_you_message_bottom: Thanks again for your generosity and support!
en.contribute.main_message: Without you, we would not be able to fund and grow this community. Contributions will go towards continually improving GroupValley and keeping it running. Help us make our community thrive by contributing.
en.contribute.main_message_bottom: Please select a monthly subscription amount that you want to contribute to GroupValley:
en.contribute.terms_1: GroupValley does not store or have access to any credit card details. All contributions are sent through
en.contribute.terms_2: Please note that your support does not constitute a charitable donation, as such your contribution is not eligible for a tax-deduction. If you have any questions regarding your contributing to GroupValley, please fill out our
en.email_confirmation.intro_paragraph: We just sent an email to {email} to confirm that your email notifications are working.
en.email_confirmation.check_email_paragraph: Please click 'Confirm Email' once you receive this message, to finish setting up your account!
en.email_confirmation.check_spam_paragraph: Check your spam folder and be sure to mark the email as Not Spam/Junk and move them to your inbox, to receive future notifications.
en.email_reminder.email_notification_remind: Did you know that you are signed up for email notifications?
Click on a button in your GroupValley emails to stop getting this reminder!
en.banned.main_message: The account that you attempted to log in to has been banned from GroupValley. If you feel that you were wrongly banned or if this is a mistake, then please contact us.
en.disable_adblocker.header_2: After your ad blocker is disabled, press "Done" to join the conversation!
en.disable_adblocker.header_3: After your ad blocker is disabled, refresh the page and press back to join the conversation!
en.disable_adblocker.ublock_1: - Click the uBlock / uBlock Origin logo.
en.disable_adblocker.adblock_plus_2: - Click "Enabled on this site". (On Firefox, click "disable on GroupValley.com")
en.disable_adblocker.adblock_2: - Click "Don't run on pages on this domain".
en.disable_adblocker.adblock_3: - On the confirmation window, toggle "Site" to the right.
